data.message: I'm sure Eminem has already donated and is now also asking others to donate because as you can see, there are a lot of kids in need of school supplies. If you can't or won't donate just shut up and move on no need to let everyone know you're too poor to help or whatever. And there's no need to insult him for trying to get others to help. And keep in mind that donations don't really need to be large as long as there are many.
